items.checkin_comment:
0,33l Flasche. Hellgelbe Farbe mit wenig Schaum. Bittere Hopfennote, kaum Frucht. Herber und getreidiger Geschmack.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 310 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 63!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 125 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 26!

Hell yea helles! This traditional German pale lager is typically full-bodied, mildly sweet, and light-colored, making it a perfect go to for any occasion. That's 30 different beers with the style of Lager - Helles or Bock - Maibock / Heller (Helles) / Lentebock. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.checkin_comment: [25.3.14] Golden in the glass, no smell. The beer starts smooth, watery with hints of grain. The mainpart is watery, slightly grainy-sweetish. The aftertaste has hints of bitterness and is gone quite quickly.

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 70 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 15!

So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.

Guess what? We’re officially 14! From October 22nd to October 27th, we’re celebrating Untappd’s 14th anniversary (woo woo)! Thanks to every one of you for making this beautifully diverse community what it is today! Let’s raise our glasses, check in a brew, earn this badge, and cheers to the next 14 years of memories with you! For extra credit, be sure to check out the latest Hop Culture piece on the beers with most 5-star check-ins on Untappd so far in 2024.
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 5 states or countries.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 15 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 4!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 25 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 6!
